title: Capitol Reef National Park: Webcam
body: Webcam         NPS  This webcam looks due east along Pleasant Creek with Wingate, Kayenta, and Navajo strata in the middleground. The Henry Mountains, in the background, were the last mountain range to be mapped and explored in the lower 48 states. This webcam is operated by the Capitol Reef Field Station. View webcam  Â                    Field Station    View webcam
